r.s: Builds on PEAR DB to abstract datatypes and automate table creation, data validation, insert, update, delete, and select; combines these with PEAR HTML_QuickForm to automatically generate input forms that match the table column definitions.
r.d: Builds on PEAR DB to abstract datatypes and automate table creation, data validation, insert, update, delete, and select; combines these with PEAR HTML_QuickForm to automatically generate input forms that match the table column definitions.
r.n: * Applied feature request 3825 "Change $elemname in error messages to $col['qf_label']" -- thanks, rotmer at gmail dot com * Fixed bug 3892 "Error in DB_Table_QuickForm->addElements" when adding radio elements -- thanks, Mark Wieseman.
